tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    scan_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    success BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_authentications(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_auth (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
fingerprint_scan BLOB NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE employee_access_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
employee_id INT,
access_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
access_result VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE fingerprint_scans (scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
employee_id INT,
fingerprint_data BLOB NOT NULL,
scan_timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE employee_roles (role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
employee_id INT,
role_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE employees (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), fingerprint_scan BLOB, access_level VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE fingerprint_scans (scan_id INT, employee_id INT, scan_date TIMESTAMP, scan_data BLOB))
CREATE TABLE access_logs (log_id INT, employee_id INT, access_time TIMESTAMP, success BOOLEAN))
CREATE TABLE departments (dept_id INT, dept_name VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT, username VARCHAR(50), password VARCHAR(255))
